item.title: Visualising Apple Health data | Guest post by Heidi Thornton
item.description: Tracking data from your Apple watch doesn’t have to stay in an app. This post shows you how it can be exported, manipulated, and visualised using R.

item.title: How sports scientists can use ggplot2 in R to make better visualisations
item.description: Great visualisations help communicate your message more clearly. This post shows you an example of my process.

item.title: How to tidy Catapult 10Hz export data
item.description: The export format of Catapult’s 10Hz GPS data isn’t ideal for analysis. This post shows you how to tidy it using R.
